name: Part 4: Wave Echo Cave
overview: Final dungeon. Ancient dwarven mine lost for 500 years. Party explores cave, deals with undead and monsters, confronts Black Spider (Nezznar the drow), finds Forge of Spells, rescues Nundro.
atmosphere: Rhythmic booming sound echoes through caves (underground hot spring). Cold, damp, drafty. Mix of worked stone and natural caverns. Undead and monsters lurk throughout.

wandering_monsters.frequency: Check on long rests or excessive noise (d20, 17-20)

major_encounters.note: Can negotiate - wants magic items or help vs spectator
Can be tricked/persuaded to leave or blinded
Final boss. Capture alive for double XP

major_treasure: Boots of Striding and Springing (Tharden's body, Area 1)
Wand of magic missiles (Dark Pool, Area 10)
Gauntlets of ogre power (Collapsed Cavern, Area 18)
Potion of healing, spider staff, 190 ep, 130 gp, 15 pp, 9 gems (10gp each), electrum mug (100gp) - Nezznar's sack

brazier_of_green_flame.power: Bathe weapon/armor for 1 min = +1 bonus for 1d12 hours
brazier_of_green_flame.note: Magic too weak for permanent enchantment

booming_waves.description: Rhythmic thunder every 2 minutes from Area 16

plot_resolution: Black Spider defeated - Nezznar captured or killed
Tharden's body found (can be returned to Gundren)
Wave Echo Cave cleared for Rockseeker mining operation
Party gets 10% share of mine profits
advancement: Party should reach level 5 by end
conclusion: Mine reopens. Phandalin prospers. Party are local heroes with permanent stake in successful mine.
